So I have 2 items I don't want to put epic gems in, and I mark them with a blue diamond while the gemming template only has rares checked. I then go and add a check to epic gems, and the gems in the items with the blue diamond now have their rare gems overridden with epic gems. Is this a bug or am I doing something wrong?

Edit: Relaunched multiple times yesterday with same behavior. Since restarting my computer, it's not regemming the items in the gear list when I change the template, but when I hit Optimize (Override Regem NOT checked) the results have epic gems in the two items.
